articles.description: Ivory Coast face fellow former champions Nigeria in the Africa Cup of Nations final in Abidjan after a remarkable run on home soil.
articles.title: Afcon 2023: Grand finale awaits between hosts Ivory Coast and Nigeria

articles.description: Jude Bellingham scores twice as Real Madrid thump surprise title challengers Girona to move five points clear at the top of La Liga.
articles.title: Bellingham double helps Real Madrid thump Girona

articles.description: Kevin de Bruyne is back, Phil Foden is firing… and now Erling Haaland has found his shooting boots. So, how do you stop Manchester City now?
articles.title: 'In his absolute prime' - Haaland adds to Man City 'super powers'

articles.description: England were desperate to entertain against Wales on their return to Twickenham but, in the end, only the result mattered.
articles.title: Just a 'first step' but England win 'vitally important'

articles.description: Bayer Leverkusen strike a crucial blow in the Bundesliga title race with victory over Bayern Munich which sends them five points clear.
articles.title: Leverkusen five points clear after win over Bayern

articles.description: Liverpool return to the top of the table as they get back to winning ways against struggling Burnley in front of a club record league crowd at Anfield.
articles.title: Liverpool return to top with win over Burnley

articles.description: Who will win Super Bowl 58, how will they do it and who will be the star men? Pre-match predictions for the NFL showpiece in Las Vegas.
articles.title: Super Bowl 2024 predictions: San Francisco 49ers v Kansas City Chiefs - who will win & why?

articles.description: Ireland aim to avoid a repeat of last year's uncomfortable trip to Rome when they host Italy in the Six Nations on Sunday.
articles.title: 'Ireland out to avoid another nervy Italy meeting'

articles.description: Dustin Johnson birdies three of the last six holes to claim the LIV Golf Las Vegas title by one shot from fellow Americans Talor Gooch and Peter Uihlein.
articles.title: Dustin Johnson wins LIV Golf's Las Vegas Invitational

articles.description: South Africa finish third at the Africa Cup of Nations after beating DR Congo 6-5 on penalties.
articles.title: South Africa secure best Afcon finish since 2000
